name: Us Army Critical Terrorist Str
description:
Us Army Critical Terrorist Strike is an action loaded, challenging yet interesting action fighting game with battle environment and you will experience epic adventure and thrill of rescuing country from the evil plan of terrorists. Show us military extra ordinary quick and perfect aim shooting skills and rapid response. the wild enemies are everywhere around you so fight with courage and passion of an army men, a true soldier of the country, with bravery & and eliminate them all. You are the only one in the battlefield so you have to fight very carefully and have to keep sharp eye on everyone during the cross firing.
Multiple shooting game action packed levels to play
Amazing First person shooting game
Multiple exciting challenging missions with AI bot Supports and Soldier Teams
Multiple automatic advanced weapons and medical Kits
Realistic battlefield environment and HD Graphics
